parameters.name: options Optional
parameters.description: Options are as follows: acceleration: An object giving the acceleration of the device on the three axis X, Y and Z. Acceleration is expressed in m/s2. accelerationIncludingGravity: An object giving the acceleration of the device on the three axis X, Y and Z with the effect of gravity. Acceleration is expressed in m/s2. rotationRate: An object giving the rate of change of the device's orientation on the three orientation axis alpha, beta and gamma. Rotation rate is express in degrees per seconds. interval: A number representing the interval of time, in milliseconds, at which data is obtained from the device.

members.name: DeviceMotionEvent.acceleration
members.description: An object giving the acceleration of the device on the three axis X, Y and Z. Acceleration is expressed in m/s2.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: Represents the acceleration upon the x axis which is the west to east axis

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Represents the acceleration upon the y axis which is the south to north axis

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: Represents the acceleration upon the z axis which is the down to up axis

members.name: DeviceMotionEvent.accelerationIncludingGravity
members.description: An object giving the acceleration of the device on the three axis X, Y and Z with the effect of gravity. Acceleration is expressed in m/s2.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: Represents the acceleration upon the x axis which is the west to east axis

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Represents the acceleration upon the y axis which is the south to north axis

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: Represents the acceleration upon the z axis which is the down to up axis

members.name: DeviceMotionEvent.rotationRate
members.description: An object giving the rate of change of the device's orientation on the three orientation axis alpha, beta and gamma. Rotation rate is express in degrees per seconds.

parameters.name: alpha
parameters.description: The rate at which the device is rotating about its Z axis; that is, being twisted about a line perpendicular to the screen.

parameters.name: beta
parameters.description: The rate at which the device is rotating about its X axis; that is, front to back.

parameters.name: gamma
parameters.description: The rate at which the device is rotating about its Y axis; that is, side to side.

members.name: DeviceMotionEvent.interval
members.description: A number representing the interval of time, in milliseconds, at which data is obtained from the device.
